name: EDSIGCON | CONISAR 2019
description: EDSIGCON is a conference devoted to Information Systems & Computing Education. CONISAR is dedicated to research in the areas of data analytics, Information Systems managment, cybersecurity, data privacy, big data managment, cloud and virtualization, and ethical issues.

data.name: Light Reception
data.description: Vanquish that jet lag with some delicious refreshments.

data.name: Registration
data.description: Hurry and get registered before the fun kicks off in earnest tomorrow!

data.name: Registration
data.description: Did you wait too long to register? Have no fear! You can still join in on the fun.

data.name: Breakfast
data.description: Chow down and fuel up before the day gets off to a great start

data.name: Sessions & Workshops Begin
data.speaker: John Doe
data.description: And we're off to the races!

data.name: Sessions
data.place: Conference rooms A, B, and C

data.name: Thursday Dinner & Fun Night
data.place: Downtown Cleveland location to be determined
data.description: Join us a fun dinner of camaraderie and all the delicious food one could want!

data.name: EDSIG Fellow Induction
data.speaker: John Doe
data.description: Please join us in welcoming the newest EDSIG fellow inductees over dinner.

data.name: Breakfast
data.description: Waffles are good way to start the day.

data.name: Sessions
data.place: Conference Rooms A, B, and C
data.speaker: Assorted
data.description: Isn't learning new things so much fun?

data.name: Distinguished Educator Keynote Lunch
data.description: Join us for lunch and keynote from a distinuished educator from within the field of information systems

data.name: EDSIG Members Meeting
data.place: A secret location, revealed only to those in the know
data.speaker: Dr. Jeffry Babb, President -- EDSIG

data.name: Reception
data.description: Join us for a reception to end the day. Don't worry, we won't keep you too long, and then it's off to dinner!

data.name: Dinner
data.description: Go out with friends and colleagues, and enjoy the best Cleveland has to offer.

data.name: Breakfast
data.description: Where are the cinnamon rolls at?

data.name: Sessions

data.speaker: Assorted
data.description: Join in on the last round of sessions. Learn you somethin'!

data.name: Awards Lunch
data.description: Join us to bid adieu to EDSIGCON | CONISAR 2019. See you next year!
